main event: A bright glowing light was observed in the sky over Denver, Colorado on 3 March 1958.
interesting points: The light was seen by many witnesses in the Denver area,The sighting lasted for about 10 minutes,The object moved at a rapid but uneven speed and made sudden changes in direction,Several calls were received by the Denver Police Department and the Air Force regarding the sighting,The case was classified as 'Unidentified' by Project Blue Book.
sighted object: bright glowing light in the sky
witness description: many witnesses in the Denver area
